# Git Gutters & File Status
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
git.color.untracked: $git-added
git.color.modified: $git-modified
editorGutter.modifiedBackground: $git-modified
editorGutter.addedBackground: $git-added
editorGutter.deletedBackground: $git-removed
||||||| merged common ancestors
hello
||||||| merged common ancestors
=======
# Git
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
# Gutter between line numbers and editor contents
editorGutter.modifiedBackground: $gitModified
editorGutter.addedBackground: $gitAdded
editorGutter.deletedBackground: $gitRemoved
# Sidebar file names and status letter
git.ignoredForeground: $gitIgnored
git.modifiedForeground: $gitModified
git.deletedForeground: $gitRemoved
git.conflictForeground: $gitConflicted
git.untrackedForeground: $gitAdded
